text: hello
hello there
tell me what are you doing
im thinking of donating money to children's charities..what are your feeling about that
I think it's a good work, I congratulate you
do you have any suggestions for charities
that perceive and move forward despite adversity, every good work has its reward
what would you say is a fair amount to donate monthly to unicef
it varies according to the income of each person, in my case 200
so you would contribute 200$ per month?
yes, sure I would like to
a generous amount,..thank you for that suggestion, now if I could only decide between unicef or children's hospital l ike shriners..any idea
children's hospital, those children need all the help possible
makes sense..what are your feelings about helping globally or community or region, country?
I really like that idea
i prefer  locally, since there is so much need...
Yes, of course, but we have to see the problem in general
have you donated to charities in past?
yes of course you like to do it
yes, i prefer working with local charities..i believe 200$ per month is a fair amount, and thank you for the suggestion
